level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see ยง 3 of Cable Television Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-409, July 15, 2002, 49 DCR 7280).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-193
level.text: For Law 14-193, see notes following ยง 34-1201.
